title: Basil attends Parliament sittings
body_lines: Former Minister of Finance Basil Rajapaksa who was tested COVID 19 attended Parliament today.
Sources said he was spotted at the party leaders meeting which was held with Speaker at the chair.
He was seen seated in a back row at the party leaders meeting.
Nevertheless, the former Minister did not come inside the chambers. (Yohan Perera and Ajith Siriwardana)
